alert.note: Alert for Grady; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:03AM CDT until June 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GRADY AND NORTHWESTERN STEPHENS COUNTIES... At 701 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Rush Springs to 6 miles west of Marlow, moving east-southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Duncan, Marlow, Rush Springs, Agawam, Central High, and Acme. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
